db:abstract.db:para: Provides an API to make serial programming simple and portable.
This documentation was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:article.db:para: Qt Serial Port provides basic functionality for configuration, I/O operations, and getting and setting the control signals of the RS-232 pinouts.
The following items are not supported by this module:

db:listitem.db:para: Terminal features, such as echo, control CR/LF, and so on.
Configuring timeouts and delays while reading or writing.

db:section.db:title: Using the Module
db:section.db:para: Using a Qt module's C++ API requires linking against the module library, either directly or through other dependencies. Several build tools have dedicated support for this, including CMake and qmake.

db:section.db:title: Building with Cmake
db:section.db:para: Use the find_package() command to locate the needed module component in the Qt6 package:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS SerialPort) target_link_libraries(mytarget PRIVATE Qt6::SerialPort)
db:section.db:para: For more details, see the Build with CMake overview.
